COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c
STRING: [Chris] “I don't have any particular plans, so I was
thinking I'd go with Fal...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: Wondering how Torta would respond, I looked at her
as I made my decision, and surprisingly she'd didn't ask
any further, and just smiled as she responded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh okay, well, I'm going to eat here as usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6
STRING: [Fal] “Ah... Perhaps I should...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine, it's not as if we had made special plans
to eat here after all. See you later, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e
STRING: As soon as she had answered, she went into the
cafeteria without giving anyone a chance to respond.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224
STRING: It was clear to me that she wasn't angry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: However, there was something lonely about her
silhouette.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: This may have been a good opportunity to create some
distance in our relationship, as it had been too close, as
it were.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e
STRING: [Fal] “Umm... Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284
STRING: I did my best to respond to Fal, who seemed worried
about what just happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: [Chris] “Really, it's okay. I always eat at the cafeteria, so
it might be fun to try something different.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0
STRING: [Chris] “More importantly, isn't it about time you
explained this secret place of yours?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0
STRING: Reverting to our normal way of speaking, Fal finally
broke into a smile when I started to joke a bit with her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322
STRING: [Fal] “You're right. Shall we be going, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: I followed behind Fal, not asking where we were
going... And noticed that she was heading down the
hall to the area where there were only practice
rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b2
STRING: [Chris] “This... Is our practice room, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: [Fal] “It certainly is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x402
STRING: [Chris] “I thought food and drink weren't allowed here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418
STRING: No one had gone as far as putting up signs, but the
students all understood it as an unwritten rule.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42e
STRING: That's just how it was, and it went without needing to
be said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: [Fal] “I know food and drink aren't allowed here, but if
it's only sometimes, why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: [Chris] “Why not, you say...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482
STRING: It was at this point in the conversation, I realized that I
never see Fal at the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: [Chris] “Do you usually eat at the cafeteria?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: Before answering my question, Fal reached into her bag
and produced a package, smiling as if she was enjoying
herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Fal] “Hm?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: Oh, it's most likely exactly how you think
it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: [Chris] “Which means...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: [Fal] “I always eat my lunch here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x590
STRING: [Fal] “I had a feeling that was the case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a6
STRING: Still clearly enjoying herself, she held out a piece of
bread that she had unwrapped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5da
STRING: [Fal] “I eat here because it's the best way to make sure
no one else takes this room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Chris] “Um... So where should I start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? You're not going to eat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62e
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I mean, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x64c
STRING: [Fal] “Then let's eat. I'll explain after.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x662
STRING: My words clearly had a specific meaning, and I realized
that Fal was aware of what I had meant when she
spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: Getting closer to her like I had been, I started to feel
that she was showing me her unique side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: She seemed so diligent... Well, she really was diligent,
but it looked like there was more to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: Fully aware that we shouldn't have been doing this, we
filled our faces with bread in the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: Smiling while we were at it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: [Chris] “In that case I'll dig in.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e4
STRING: [Fal] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fa
STRING: Charmed by that smile of hers, I also smiled and took
the palm-sized piece of bread she was still holding out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x710
STRING: The room was starting to feel warmer, and the aroma of
the bread reminded me that I was hungry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73c
STRING: Thanking her, I took a bite from the bread I was given,
inhaling the scent of garlic that came from within.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x752
STRING: The bread was filled with various things, and I soon
tasted the lettuce and tomato in my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x768
STRING: [Chris] “This is great...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77e
STRING: It was simple, but the vegetables were fresh, and there
was a sauce I didn't quite recognize mixed into it, and it
just tasted really good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: [Fal] “Really? I'm glad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7bc
STRING: [Chris] “So... Weren't you going to explain something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d2
STRING: Still eating, she started to explain what was going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7de
STRING: Perhaps it was because we were in the practice rooms,
which were kind of special, but this was all starting to
feel kind of fun.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fc
STRING: [Fal] “Shall I start by answering your question? You
asked me if I always ate here, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81c
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83a
STRING: [Fal] “To tell you the truth, it's this room. I like it
in here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x850
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86e
STRING: [Fal] “A lot of people enter this building from the back
door, so if I just come here after eating lunch, I often
find that someone has already taken this room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: [Chris] “I guess that's to be expected... But aren't all
these rooms the same?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b6
STRING: [Fal] “That's absolutely right. This is just, you know, one
of those things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8cc
STRING: [Chris] “A personal preference?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: [Fal] “I guess you could say that. It's really nothing more
than that, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: Saying so, she looked around the room, and then
laughed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90c
STRING: [Chris] “That's weird.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92a
STRING: [Fal] “Indeed it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: Before I knew it, Fal had another piece of bread ready
in her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x954
STRING: [Fal] “Here you are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96a
STRING: [Chris] “Are you sure?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: [Fal] “That's what I made them for, you know? I'm not
going to be able to eat all of them myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Chris] “That brings up the same question again, why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c6
STRING: [Fal] “To pay you back for yesterday, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9dc
STRING: [Chris] “Ah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: [Fal] “I said I'd pay you back, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: [Chris] “You did, but... I didn't think you meant in this
kind of way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2e
STRING: [Fal] “What did you think I meant?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa44
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I thought you were going to get angry at
me for laughing at you yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha, I was too thankful to be angry about that!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: Laughing for a moment, Fal then took a bite from her
bread.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: That makes this the second time she's made a meal for
me as a thank you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa4
STRING: It wasn't an overly special way of going about it, but a
delicious meal was always nice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaba
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks a lot for lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad0
STRING: I was full after eating two of the bigger ones.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: It seemed that one was enough for Fal, and since she
had made four, there was one left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafa
STRING: [Fal] “Are you sure that was enough?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb10
STRING: [Chris] “I should ask you the same thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2e
STRING: [Fal] “One is more than enough for me. I made the extra
ones today for you, Chris. But it's okay, I can take this
last one home and eat it later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb58
STRING: [Chris] “Fair enough. Either way, thanks again. That was
really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: [Fal] “You are welcome. I'm glad you liked it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba6
STRING: Fal wrapped up the bread once more, and then began
to carefully check the practice room floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbbc
STRING: [Chris] “Did you drop something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: [Fal] “No, I'm just making sure I didn't leave any crumbs
on the floor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right. It'd be a problem if someone found
out, huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc40
STRING: [Fal] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: Like a child that was sharing a naughty secret, Fal
brought a finger to her lips as she looked up at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm surprised you haven't been caught,
considering how often you eat here...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: Supervising teachers sometimes went around the
practice rooms to make sure they were being used
properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc98
STRING: Apparently, sleeping students had often found
themselves being kicked out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: [Fal] “You know, I was actually caught once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd6
STRING: [Chris] “So you have been caught...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd08
STRING: [Fal] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: [Fal] “I wanted to practice just a little bit longer. I'm
truly sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd76
STRING: [Fal] “When I said that to the teacher, they just
genuinely believed me. And if they saw me through the
window after that, they'd just smile and walk away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda0
STRING: [Chris] “See, this is why top students like you are
trouble... If I did the same thing, I'm sure I'd be dressed
down.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xddc
STRING: [Fal] “Aha-ha! You're probably right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf2
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe24
STRING: [Fal] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3a
STRING: [Chris] “What you told the teacher was really what you
felt, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: [Fal] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6e
STRING: [Chris] “About wanting to practice just a little longer?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe84
STRING: She did make it sound like she was joking when she
told me what she had said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: But, from what I had seen of her attitude towards her
music, I believed that was what she had truly felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec2
STRING: [Fal] “It might have been, yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: [Fal] “Um...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf22
STRING: Anyway, so that's what happened and now
this is kind of like my own VIP room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf50
STRING: Which means I
don't want it to get dirty, and I even clean it
sometimes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf66
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: And so, in the same way she did, I checked the floor
around where I sat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfae
STRING: [Fal] “It should be okay, though. I always choose a
slightly hard type of bread.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: It was as she said, it didn't appear that we'd dropped
any crumbs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I think we're good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: [Fal] “Great. So, shall we do some practice, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: [Fal] “Hehehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: She laughed happily, but also mischievously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106c
STRING: [Chris] “Hm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109e
STRING: [Fal] “Nothing. It's just, I knew that we'd end up
practicing together if I brought you here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10be
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Ohhhh!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: [Fal] “Just as I planned.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1106
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha, that was your plan?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111c
STRING: It was true, however, that I couldn't have declined at
this point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1128
STRING: But, I think I probably wouldn't have declined, even if
she hadn't done this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113e
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I guess that works, too. Shall we start?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Fal] “Yes. Let's begin with our usual rehearsal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Fal] “Good job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that was nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1212
STRING: I was also starting to get used to leaving the practice
room with her after we had finished packing up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1262
STRING: There were the occasional times that we couldn't leave
together, but today Fal suggested we head back
together, and I had no reason to refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a0
STRING: It occurred to me that through our music in this way,
the amount of time I spent with Fal had increased.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b6
STRING: My thoughts were still hazy, but time had been passing,
calmly and surely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12cc
STRING: I felt like the sound of her voice was still lingering deep
in my ears, muffling the sound of the rain on the
pavement.
